thread.title: Nigel
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Nigel

author: Nigel
title: Nigel
text: In France where I live it's almost 50% more expensive. Given the postage was included in the price its excellent value. The jacket arrived in very rapidly. However the French parcel service was to deliver to my address but didn't bother and just dumped it off in a village shop four miles away. All in all I got it in less than a week.
